ca.uqac.lif.ecp.statechart

Class GreedyAtomicStatechartGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uqac.lif.ecp.TraceGenerator<T>
      • ca.uqac.lif.ecp.GreedyTraceGenerator<AtomicEvent>
        • ca.uqac.lif.ecp.statechart.GreedyAtomicStatechartGenerator

  • public class GreedyAtomicStatechartGenerator
extends GreedyTraceGenerator<AtomicEvent>
    Greedy generator when the input specification is an atomic UML statechart. In such a case, candidate traces are generated by performing a random walk in the given statechart.
    Author:
    Sylvain Hall√©
